Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-rust, help2man <!nodoc>, librust-anyhow-1+default-dev, librust-async-trait-0.1+default-dev, librust-async-recursion-1+default-dev, librust-clap-4+default-dev, librust-clap-4+derive-dev, librust-const-format-0.2+default-dev, librust-colored-2+default-dev, librust-csv-1+default-dev, librust-either-1+default-dev, librust-hashbag-0.1+default-dev, librust-indexmap-2+default-dev, librust-indoc-2+default-dev <!nocheck>, librust-itertools-0.13+default-dev <!nocheck>, librust-lazy-regex-3+default-dev, librust-lazy-static-1+default-dev, librust-minijinja-2+default-dev, librust-minijinja-2+loader-dev, librust-nom-7+default-dev, librust-nom-locate-4+default-dev, librust-oxiri-0.2+default-dev, librust-oxigraph-0.4+default-dev, librust-oxrdf-0.2+default-dev, librust-oxrdf-0.2+rdf-star-dev, librust-oxrdfio-0.1+default-dev, librust-oxrdfio-0.1+rdf-star-dev, librust-oxsdatatypes-0.2+default-dev, librust-oxttl-0.1+default-dev, librust-oxttl-0.1+rdf-star-dev, librust-pretty-0.12+default-dev, librust-regex-1+default-dev, librust-reqwest-0.12+blocking-dev, librust-reqwest-0.12+default-dev, librust-reqwest-0.12+json-dev, librust-rust-decimal-1+default-dev, librust-serde-1+default-dev, librust-serde-1+derive-dev, librust-serde-derive-1+default-dev, librust-serde-json-1+default-dev, librust-serde-yaml-0.9+default-dev, librust-serde-yml-dev (<< 0.0.13), librust-sparesults-0.2+default-dev, librust-sparesults-0.2+rdf-star-dev, librust-spargebra-0.3+default-dev, librust-spargebra-0.3+rdf-star-dev, librust-supports-color-3+default-dev, librust-thiserror-2+default-dev, librust-tokio-1+default-dev, librust-tokio-1+full-dev, librust-tracing-0.1+default-dev, librust-tracing-subscriber-0.3+default-dev, librust-tracing-subscriber-0.3+fmt-dev, librust-url-2+default-dev, librust-void-1+default-dev, libstring-shellquote-perl <!nodoc>
Description: RDF data shape processing rudof implements Shape Expressions (ShEx), SHACL, DCTAP, and other technologies in the RDF ecosystem. . It can be used to validate RDF data represented with different syntaxes like Turtle, NTriples, etc. as well as RDF data available through SPARQL endpoints like Wikidata. . rudof can also be used to convert between different RDF data validation technologies like ShEx, SHACL, DCTAP, etc., and to generate UML like visualizations and HTML views. . Resource Description Framework (RDF) is a standard model for data interchange on the Web. . Shape Expressions (ShEx) is a data modelling language for defining schemas for RDF graphs. . Shapes Constraint Language (SHACL) is a data modelling language for describing constraints for RDF graphs. SHACL is a W3C recommendation. . Dublin Core Tabular Application Profiles (DCTAP) is a simple model for defining an application profiles i.e. metadata usage for a specific application.
